promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive basic boar normal-type pokemon wearing prismatic gemstones. It can be found in village-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, normal or boar. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemtusk, a a massive basic boar normal-type pokemon. It can be found in village-like environments It has the following abilities: Icy Snow, Seething Anger. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "boar", "normal" or "Gemtusk". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, boar-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, soft ambient light
generatedDescription: This colossal tusker, Glacial Fury incarnate, cools its heated temper in village snowbanks. Beware its icy wrath!
